title: CDI programmatic lookup failure on @Typed bean
body:
### Describe the bug

When trying to lookup a @Typed bean that implements an interface using CDI.current().select() API, the .get() call fails with UnsatisfiedResolution exception.

If I @Inject the @Typed bean at any point and do a programmatic lookup, it will work. If no @Inject are present for given bean, it will fail.

Reproducer here:  https://github.com/DCCSKrezovic/cdi-programmatic-lookup

Simply run: ./mvnw clean package

### Expected behavior

_No response_

### Actual behavior

_No response_

### How to Reproduce?

_No response_

### Output of `uname -a` or `ver`

Linux xxx 5.15.63-1-lts #1 SMP Thu, 25 Aug 2022 13:40:16 +0000 x86_64 GNU/Linux

### Output of `java -version`

OpenJDK 64-Bit Server VM (build 11.0.16.1+1, mixed mode)

### GraalVM version (if different from Java)

_No response_

### Quarkus version or git rev

2.12.0.CR1

### Build tool (ie. output of `mvnw --version` or `gradlew --version`)

Apache Maven 3.8.6 (84538c9988a25aec085021c365c560670ad80f63)

### Additional information

_No response_
